title: BLACKBOX
content:
You could use the shape from the bottom of the q to make the i and j have dots (I would get rid of it from the q).   
   
The y could be just like the g except having a vertical cut out of the top.   
   
The f is quite topheavy. For the k you could use vertical cuts next to the vertical stroke and one horizontal cut on the right side.   
   
Just a few ideas for ya.
author: matt_desmond
